plugins.successComment:
:tada: This ${issue.pull_request ? 'PR' : 'issue'} was just released in version ${nextRelease.version}!
Check out the [GitHub release here!](<github_release_url>)

plugins.successCmd:
tmp=$(mktemp)
cat <<'EOF' > "$tmp"
${nextRelease.notes}
EOF
NEXT_RELEASE_VERSION=${nextRelease.version} NEXT_RELEASE_NOTES_FILE="$tmp" GITHUB_REPOSITORY=${process.env.GITHUB_REPOSITORY} npx tsx ./bin/send-discord-notification.ts
rm "$tmp"
